basics.name: Deepak Vig
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary:
Conscientious, results-driven, articulate and analytical software engineer; primarily focusing on frontend and backend development. Strong in software design and agile team management.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Interested in challenging technical roles related to development of web applications.

highlights: Involved in end-to-end development of a new product from the ground up, working in Ruby on Rails.
Is responsible for development scheduling and product delivery.
Involved in end-to-end development of a new product from the ground up, working in Ruby on Rails and React.js frontend and RESTful API, with MySQL database systems.
Engineered the in-use worker environment to interface with various SOAP and RESTful logistics courier APIs.
Introduced continuous integration and code coverage tools with Travis, and created custom Docker containers to speed up testing execution.
Was responsible for development scheduling and product delivery.
Work on various small to large scale websites using Ruby on Rails and jQuery.
Was handling small team of developer for various projects.
Enabling Fancy features over the Telecom services.
Participated in this community service initiative that allowed students to plan and execute our own service: Bring Moxi to the Society.
In the event, we prepared computers and helped kindergartners to create their very own Moxi drawings using a stylus.
These drawings were then printed onto customized e-cards which could be sent to parents and loved ones.

education.institution: International Institute of Information Technology - Hyderabad

publications.summary: NIRT is an internal tool for Novartis for doing clinical trials.

publications.name: TeePublic:Web:Ruby on Rails, JavaScript, jQuery, PostgreSQL
publications.summary: A place where a person can discover, support and promote t-shirt designs created by a passionate community of artists. Artist can upload his designs and will get paid based on the number of shirts sold for that design. Each shirt has be funded before it can be shipped. So people can prompt the designs by sharing it on facebook.

publications.summary: Helps prospective graduate students and graduate programs to thoroughly evaluate, search for and communicate based upon each other's attributes. I have headed this project right from the beginning to the deployment.
